keyword: how many calories are in a fruit
title: How Many Calories Are in a Fruit?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a fruit, with data for a medium apple as example, plus macros, variations, and FAQs for common fruits.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Fruit?
assumptions: Assuming 1 medium apple (182 g), raw with skin; fruits vary widely (e.g., banana ~105 kcal, strawberries ~49 kcal for 1 cup).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fruit type, size, ripeness, and preparation. Check labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium apple provides about 95 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a fruit like an apple?
faqs.a: A medium apple has about 95 kcal.

faqs.q: What fruit has the most calories?
faqs.a: Dried fruits or avocados; e.g., 1 avocado ~230 kcal vs. apple's 95.

faqs.q: Are calories in fruit from sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, mostly natural sugars; e.g., 19 g in a medium apple.

faqs.q: How does fruit fiber affect calories?
faqs.a: Fiber (4.4 g in apple) adds bulk but minimal calories; aids digestion.
